dialogues.speaker: Osupp
dialogues.message: I AM THE NOTORIOUS CAPTAIN OSUPP!!! FEARED PIRATE, AND RULER OF THIS VILLAGE!!!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Hey Osupp. Still playing pretend with all these skeletons around?

dialogues.speaker: Osupp
dialogues.message: PRETEND??? DARN! HE SAW THROUGH ME!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Hahahaha you're funny!! Have you really not noticed the skeletons?

dialogues.speaker: Osupp
dialogues.message: HEY! ARE YOU LAUGHING!? AT ME!!? I'M A PROUD MAN! WHICH IS WHY THEY CALL ME PROUD CAPTAIN OSUPP!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Okay Captain! Anyways, be careful with the skeletons.

dialogues.speaker: Osupp
dialogues.message: Skeletons? Only new thing I've seen here are old men, each with a big wound.
